quote: Learn from your experiences and past mistakes, assimilate them and convert them to formulas to achieve sustenance first , and then work your way to success to be the leaders in the market.
quote_letters: LEARN FROM YOUR EXPERIENCES AND PAST MISTAKES ASSIMILATE THEM AND CONVERT THEM TO FORMULAS TO ACHIEVE SUSTENANCE FIRST  AND THEN WORK YOUR WAY TO SUCCESS TO BE THE LEADERS IN THE MARKET
